mapper.insert: insert into c_level_info (CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID, LEVEL_NAME, MIN_POINT, MAX_POINT) values (#{customerLevelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxPoint,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID, LEVEL_NAME, MIN_POINT, MAX_POINT from c_level_info
